entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Savant Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 10:00 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -6.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: ESE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
